resources.string: FMS will playback audio from the microphone through your headphones with a timedelay.\nAfter pressing the button it will take the specified amount of time, till you hear the first sound.
Aborting not possible during initialisation. Please wait for the delay.
I think you don\'t have a headphones plugged in.\nThis will create audio feedback.
There was an error initialising, try a lower delay.
